name: Inpatient GMTK
description: A misdiagnosed patient, having lost years of his life in an asylum and yearning for freedom, escapes into the  hallways of this old building in a last, desperate bid for the outside world. Medications and their side effects hinder or help his flight, as well as doctors and security guards patrolling the premises. Help this innocent man feel the cool air of freedom on his face once again!
